title: The Full Investigation
description: You've received an anonymous tip about a suspicious domain: 'https://kmcc-uk.org/'. Step 1: Use WHOIS to find the registrar name. Step 2: Use DNS lookup to find the first A record (first IPv4 address). Step 3: Use IP geolocation to find the country code. Combine them in format: REGISTRAR_IP_COUNTRY (all uppercase, use first word of registrar only).
hints: Break this into three separate lookups: WHOIS, DNS, and IP geolocation.
Use the tools from previous challenges to solve each step.
